sentences.sContent: They seemed to love the land and the people with a sort of fierce egoism.
sentences.sContent_eng: They seemed to love the land and the people with a sort of fierce egoism.
sentences.sCn: 他们似乎是带著强烈的利己主义来爱这里的人和土地的。

sentences.sContent: When egoism gains the upper hand, many people find it growingly hard to help others.
sentences.sContent_eng: When egoism gains the upper hand, many people find it growingly hard to help others.
sentences.sCn: 当利己主义获得了上风，许多人觉得越来越难去帮助别人。

sentences.sContent: People shelve the out - of - fashion moral icon and espouse the philosophy of egoism.
sentences.sContent_eng: People shelve the out - of - fashion moral icon and espouse the philosophy of egoism.
sentences.sCn: 搁置了人民的时尚图标和拥护道德哲学的利己主义。
